Text: Net First GUARANTEED APPROVAL MASTERCARDFor the week of Thursday October IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE HelloWe have reviewed several online credit card programs and feel that the Net First MasterCard is one of the best for anyone who needs a credit card With the Net First program you are ABSOLUTELY GUARANTEED APPROVAL ONLINE No credit checks and No credit turndowns GET A GUARANTEED MASTERCARD NOW Even if you have had chargeoffs slow pay situations late payments bad credit or even no credit you can still qualify for the Net First MasterCard If you are at least a US citizen or permanent resident of the US with a valid checking account you are GUARANTEED APPROVAL for a new MASTERCARD YOU CAN REESTABLISH YOUR CREDIT Sincerely New Offers Department Important subscription information Your privacy is extremely important to us You are receiving this offer because you are a registered subscriber to one of our affiliate sites and have requested to receive recurring mailings As a leader in permissionbased email marketing we are committed to delivering a highly rewarding experience with offers that include valuable discounts bargains special offers sweepstakes entertainment travel and financial opportunities However if you feel you have received this message in error or if you wish to unsubscribe please see the remove instructions at the end of this message Thank you for reading our special offers Please forward this deal alert along to your friends Have a great day Email Source Information This email has been sent to you as a subscriber of MediaTreccom To remove yourself from this mailing list point your browser to optoutcfm Enter your email address in the field provided and click Unsubscribe IMAGE
